GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v4.19.232
GSD.description:
usb: gadget: rndis: add spinlock for rndis response list

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.232 by commit 9f688aadede6b862a0a898792b1a35421c93636f, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit f6281af9d62e128aa6efad29cf7265062af114f2. For more details please see the references link.
